short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Single system to connect all online services for Lync users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lync is a central system that integrates with multiple applications, websites to enable single sign on access as its core module.
Please note: Your school or Institution must have a lync integrations to use this plugin. Contact your school administration for details or write to  help@letslync.com
